channel.title: R on Practical Disregard
channel.description: Recent content in R on Practical Disregard

item.title: COVID Crime Impacts
item.description: Curiosity I’ve been thinking a lot lately about what’s different now. When the lockdown first started, I couldn’t stop thinking about how government, specifically local government, was going to have to come up with solutions to new problems on the fly and try as much as possible to limit negative unintended consequences.
